programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke remembers the Cuban missile crisis and Nixon's golf club scandal.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers the Cuban missile crisis, weapons inspections in Iraq and the scandal of Richard Nixon's membership of an all white golf club.
